description: VaultLdapAuth authenticates with Vault using the LDAP authentication method, with the username and password stored in a Kubernetes Secret resource.

path.description: Path where the LDAP authentication backend is mounted in Vault, e.g: "ldap"

secretRef.description: SecretRef to a key in a Secret resource containing password for the LDAP user used to authenticate with Vault using the LDAP authentication method

username.description: Username is a LDAP user name used to authenticate using the LDAP Vault authentication method
